Risk Description: Network policies API not available in MCP tools
Mitigation Strategy: Research API in Sprint 1 week 1; defer to later sprint if preview; mark as preview feature

Risk Description: ABAC API not GA or available
Mitigation Strategy: Research API in Sprint 1 week 1; implement as preview feature or defer; use tags API as alternative
Implement pagination for large datasets; add caching for metadata; optimize SQL queries; parallelize checks
Test on all 3 clouds early in Sprint 1; create cloud-specific validation logic; document differences

Risk Description: IAM policy parsing complexity for storage credentials
Mitigation Strategy: Use existing JSON parsing libraries; limit scope to common patterns; extensive testing on all clouds

Risk Description: Sprint timeline slippage due to unforeseen issues
Mitigation Strategy: Build 20% buffer into estimates; prioritize high-impact checks; defer low-priority if needed

Risk Description: Insufficient test coverage for new checks
Mitigation Strategy: Create dedicated test workspaces on all clouds; populate with diverse configs; automate test data setup
Clear communication plan; gradual deprecation; comprehensive documentation; migration guides

Risk Description: Apps API inconsistent or missing fields
Mitigation Strategy: Flexible validation logic; handle missing fields gracefully; fallback to generic permissions API

Risk Description: Secret scanning in init scripts performance impact
Mitigation Strategy: Limit scope to global init scripts only; optimize regex patterns; consider async processing

Risk Description: AI Gateway configuration varies by model type
Mitigation Strategy: Comprehensive testing across model types; flexible validation; clear documentation of supported configs
Maintain backward compatibility; add new logic without removing old; extensive regression testing
